mapper.insert: insert into movie(genrecode1, genrecode2, genrecode3, title, story, nation, director, actor, year, releasedate) values (#{genrecode1}, #{genrecode2}, #{genrecode3}, #{title}, #{story}, #{nation}, #{director}, #{actor}, #{year}, #{releasedate})
mapper.select: select max(${seqMovie}) as seqMovie from movie
select * from movie where title like #{title}
